name: @stick2yourmind/personal-budget
description: NodeJS, ExpressJS, SQL, React app for personal budget management

scripts.backend-dev-db-migrate: cd ./backend && npx prisma migrate dev --name init
scripts.backend-dev-first: cd ./backend && npx prisma migrate dev --name init && npx ts-node-dev --respawn index.ts
scripts.backend-first: cd ./backend && npx prisma migrate dev --name init && tsc --build && node ./dist/index.js
